Plot: A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.
Title: Quiz Show
Actors: John Turturro, Rob Morrow, Ralph Fiennes, Paul Scofield
tomatoConsensus: Robert Redford refracts the sociopolitical and moral issues posed by the subject material through a purely entertaining, well-acted lens.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 24 nominations.
